value.title: How self-driving cars will 'talk' to pedestrians
value.excerpt: Road safety relies on all types of communication between people and vehicles, and most importantly on a psychologist-coined term, "communicating intent." As pedestrians and fellow drivers we're constantly indicating what we're about to do,

value.title: Self-driving startup Robotics Research raises $228 mln in funding
value.excerpt: Self-driving technology startup Robotic Research said on Thursday it has raised $228 million from investors including SoftBank 9984.T to scale up its commercial division's solutions for trucks, buses and logistics vehicles.

value.title: TPA tests new self-driving wheelchairs
value.excerpt: The motorized wheelchairs, similar to the ones you’d see in a supermarket, are free for passengers including those with mobility issues and injuries.

value.title: Those Sordid Follow-Home Robberies To First Rise And Then Thankfully Decline During The Coming Era Of AI Self-Driving Cars
value.excerpt: Follow-home robberies are in the news quite a bit. For the coming era of AI self-driving cars, such criminal acts will at first be emboldened and then later be generally overcome as driverless cars become widespread.

value.title: Mumbai-based firm to launch AIoT-enabled driverless car next year. Details here
value.excerpt: Mumbai-based automobile-as-a-service company - Autonomous Intelligence Motors Private Limited (AIMPL) - on Wednesday announced that it will launch an artificial intelligence-of-things (AIoT) powered autonomous car in the country next year.

value.title: Ex-Tesla, Impossible Foods lawyer takes top legal job at robot farming startup
value.excerpt: Myra Pasek, who was the second in-house lawyer hired by Tesla Inc's Elon Musk and the first general counsel for Impossible Foods Inc, is taking on a new startup assignment, joining Silicon Valley-based robotic farming company Iron Ox Inc as general counsel.

value.title: Intel Plans Potential $50 Billion IPO For Its Israeli Self-Driving Car Unit, Shares Rise
value.excerpt: The tech giant said that it would take its self-driving car firm, Mobileye, public next year at a potential valuation of more than $50 billion, sources first told The Wall Street Journal. Intel originally acquired 100% of the Israeli company in 2017 for $15.

value.title: Here's what defines a self-driving car
value.excerpt: Get the breakdown on what is and what isn't a self-driving car. Spoiler: Teslas aren't autonomous. Despite what some companies may say, there are no self-driving cars on sale. None. value.title: 193 countries adopt 1st global agreement on Ethics of AI
value.excerpt: All member nations of the United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO) adopted on Thursday a historical text that defines the common values and principles needed to ensure the healthy development of artificial intelligence (AI).

value.title: 193 countries adopt the first global agreement on the Ethics of Artificial Intelligence

value.title: Tesla's Self-Driving Business Is Powering Ahead Despite Setbacks
value.excerpt: The run-up is partly due to Tesla’s solid execution, with deliveries for this year poised to grow by almost 70% to about 850,000 vehicles, despite the ongoing semiconductor shortage. Tesla’s sizable lead in the self-driving market has also traditionally been a very big driver of the company’s valuation.
